variant.question: What does the term ?significant point' mean??

options.text: A specified geographical position used to define an area navigation route or the flight path of an aircraft employing area navigation.
A defined position on an aerodrome used for the calibration of the inertial navigation system.
A signal indicating the direction of the runway-in-use.
A term used to define a specified and identifiable location on the manoeuvring area of an aerodrome.

variant.question: What does the term "significant point" mean?

options.text: A specified geographical position used in defining an ATS route or the flight path of an aircraft and for other navigation and ATS purposes.
A specified geographical position used to define an area navigation route or the flight path of an aircraft employing area navigation.
A defined position on an aerodrome used for the calibration of the inertial navigation system.
A signal indicating the direction of the runway-in-use.
